publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2601# Robin Harper: United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development-That the Parliament supports the attendance of the First Minister at the United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (Rio+10) in Johannesburg, South Africa in September 2002 in order to represent the Scottish people, to report on the progress being made in Scotland towards implementing the Rio agreement and to demonstrate continuing commitment to this issue.
S1M-2601# United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (lodged on 14 January 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-2601# Robin Harper: United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development-That the Parliament supports the attendance of the First Minister at the United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (Rio + 10) in Johannesburg, South Africa in September 2002 in order to represent the Scottish people, to report on the progress being made in Scotland towards implementing the Rio agreement and to demonstrate continuing commitment to this issue. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson
S1M-2601# United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (lodged on 14 January 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2601# United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (lodged on 14 January 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2601# United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (lodged on 14 January 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2601# United Nations World Summit on Sustainable Development (lodged on 14 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
